attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAWS for international gay couples like us, simon thomas calveley, raymond joseph ratnam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RESPECTABLY because for us ,it has been way way too long

rejection.details: It is not clear from your e-petition exactly what spefic change you are seeking.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
